item.title: Nastry Tricks with Go Generate
item.description: Nasty tricks with go generate novembre 24th, 2021 What follows here is just a general idea of how and individual with malicious intent can theoretically attack a CI system or a build machine using the go generate tool. The idea is very simple, first the attacker should embed a go generate directive into its application, then at build time (using make or cmake or whatever itâ€™s used to run the build) should run the go generate command.
